channel.title: Hey sorry to bother anyone but
channel.description: i have downloaded moparscape and extracted all the files and when i run it its all good but how do u make an account? can anyone tell me? do u put in a runescape account that you have made? i am very confused [br][size=1]Posted at: July 12, 2006, 10:29:13 AM[/size][hr]this may sound pretty stupid but how do u find ur ip? [br][size=1]Posted at: July 12, 2006, 10:38:39 AM[/size][hr]ok i found out my ip adress but..... it still says error connecting to server what should i do? [br][size=1]Posted at: July 12, 2006, 10:50:33 AM[/size][hr]anyone???!!!

item.title: Hey sorry to bother anyone but
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:

how do you download a source?

item.source: Hey sorry to bother anyone but

item.title: Hey sorry to bother anyone but
item.dc:creator: @cawagula cawagula
item.description:
@cawagula wrote:

If you are trying to play on your own server you need to download a source, and if you have the source running you don’t even need to enter your IP. You only need to enter IP if your using someone elsees server, And unless your using HybridScape accounts are created automatcially upon signing in.

Read full topic

item.title: Hey sorry to bother anyone but
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

open up command promt (start > run > type “cmd” > hit enter) and type in “ipconfig” it will then show your local IP address.

OR in the server input type “localhost” or “127.0.0.1”

Read full topic
